title: Sensors and systems for fruit detection and localization: A review

excerpt: Abstract This paper reviews the research and development of machine vision systems for fruit detection and localization for robotic harvesting and/or crop-load estimation of specialty tree crops including apples, pears, and citrus. Variable lighting condition, occlusions, and  ...
